alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 2:48PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong winds with developing showers will impact portions of Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 246 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking light showers developing over Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties capable of producing strong winds along with blowing dust. Movement of this activity is east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Walsh, Pritchett, Vilas, Campo, Two Buttes, Stonington and Two Buttes Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This activity may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
